description: Students survey the solo art song repertoire of Germany, Italy, and Spain. The course
highlights the significant features and development of the art song, and provides
context, approaches, and resources for studying this literature.  Course work includes
in-class performance. Offered fall semester 2019-20 and alternate years. Prerequisite:
MUSIC 214 and MUSIC 141or permission of instructor; MUSIC 263 and MUSIC 264 preferred.
